# signals

**Instance Property**

The set of signals to activate.

## Declaration

```swift
var signals: INCarSignalOptions { get }
```

## Discussion

For a list of valid signals, see [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INCarSignalOptions].

When this property contains a valid [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INCarSignalOptions] set, activate only the specified audible or visual signals.
title: signals
